props.name: value
props.description: Initial value

props.name: minimumValue
props.description: Track minimum value

props.name: maximumValue
props.description: Track maximum value

props.name: initialMinimumValue
props.description: Initial minimum value

props.name: initialMaximumValue
props.description: Initial maximum value

props.name: step
props.description: Step value of the slider. The value should be between 0 and (maximumValue - minimumValue)

props.name: useRange
props.description: If true the Slider will display a second thumb for the min value

props.name: useGap
props.description: If true the min and max thumbs will not overlap

props.name: onValueChange
props.description: Callback for onValueChange

props.name: onRangeChange
props.description: Callback for onRangeChange. Returns values object with the min and max values

props.name: onSeekStart
props.description: Callback that notifies about slider seeking is started

props.name: onSeekEnd
props.description: Callback that notifies about slider seeking is finished

props.name: onReset
props.description: Callback that notifies when the reset function was invoked

props.name: containerStyle
props.description: The container style

props.name: minimumTrackTintColor
props.description: The color used for the track from minimum value to current value

props.name: maximumTrackTintColor
props.description: The track color

props.name: trackStyle
props.description: The track style

props.name: renderTrack
props.description: Custom render instead of rendering the track

props.name: thumbTintColor
props.description: Thumb color

props.name: disabledThumbTintColor
props.description: Disabled thumb color

props.name: thumbStyle
props.description: The thumb style

props.name: activeThumbStyle
props.description: The active (during press) thumb style

props.name: enableThumbShadow
props.description: Whether the thumb will have a shadow (with 'migrate' true only)

props.name: thumbHitSlop
props.description: Defines how far a touch event can start away from the thumb

props.name: disableActiveStyling
props.description: If true the Slider will not change it's style on press

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true the Slider will be disabled and will appear in disabled color

props.name: disableRTL
props.description: If true the Slider will stay in LTR mode even if the app is on RTL mode

props.name: accessible
props.description: If true the component will have accessibility features enabled

props.name: throttleTime
props.description: Control the throttle time of the onValueChange and onRangeChange callbacks

props.name: testID
props.description: The component test id
